name: Who Stole My Beard?
description:
Set in the idyllic town of Beardsville, where the law requires every citizen to have a beard, you must help Indie and his friends discover the culprit who stole his prize winning beard. Sleuth around town wearing fake beards acquired on your journey to question suspects, help the citizens of Beardsville, discover new clues and follow new leads. Can you solve the crime before the annual Beard Festival, or will you be discovered and exiled from Beardsville forever?

Inspired by classic point-and-click adventure games of the past, Who Stole My Beard is a relaxing and polished game suitable for all ages!

Detective Adventure


Explore the vast town of Beardsville. The suburbs, university, museum, park, city hall and run down slum districts are just a few of the places to visit.

Meet townsfolk and help them with their daily needs as you forge new friendships and compile a list of suspects.

Solve puzzles and unlock new beards to gain access to restricted areas and discover new clues.

Fulfill the townsfolk's requests. Some may want food, others may be looking for love or a new job. Fulfilling the requests of the townsfolk will earn you their favor and trust, unlocking new avenues of investigation.

Cooperate with your dog companion, Leo, to discuss case clues, suspects and plan of action. He may be a little sardonic, but his help is invaluable.

Fight off the Beardsville Police in a unique card-based, stealth battle system.

Hours of Relaxing Gameplay


- A charming cast of over 200 unique (and bearded) characters
- Unique, card/puzzle based battle system
- Immersive story rich with mystery, side plots and conspiracy!
- Many different types of puzzles: escape-rooms, logic, riddles, code breaking, and more
- Original artwork
- Dad jokes
- Beards!
